item.title: We Three Keys Writeup
item.description: We Three Keys was a fairly straightforward crypto challenge which required a bit of thinking, but was slightly disappointing in the end.

item.title: Securinets2019 Maze
item.description: We recently participated in the Securinets qualifying CTF, where we placed 7th out of a few hundred teams. Maze was a fun cryptography challenge which wasnâ€™t all that challenging once i figured out what I had to do.
